name: Presentation Projector (CSE)
description: Portable projector kit with HDMI adapters for seminars and classes.
usageRules: Handle lens carefully; use surge-protected power; pack all accessories on return; late or damaged return leads to fines and temporary suspension.

name: GPU Workstation A6000
description: High-memory CUDA workstation for deep learning model training; local login only.
location: CSE Lab Office, Room CS-204 (collect/return with lab assistant)
usageRules: Use institute credentials; do not mine crypto; save work to user home or designated project drive; no food/drinks near workstation; power down only if instructed; violations may lead to account suspension.

name: GPU Server Node-01 (SSH)
description: Remote-access GPU node for queued training with reserved SSH windows.
location: Provisioning via CSE Systems Desk, CS-201 (account enabling only)
usageRules: Access only during booked slot; limit GPU memory to assigned quota; terminate jobs 15 minutes before end; store data on assigned path; non-compliance results in job kill and booking suspension.

name: Data Processing Workstation-128G
description: 16-core CPU, 128 GB RAM for preprocessing and simulations.
location: CSE Compute Room, CS-118 (check-in/out with assistant)
usageRules: Login with campus ID; no admin rights; store on scratch; remove personal media post-session; unattended sessions >15 minutes may be terminated; repeated misuse leads to access revocation.

name: MATLAB Licence Seat
description: Time-bound floating seat for MATLAB/Simulink; limited concurrent seats.
location: CSE Systems Desk, CS-201 (seat activation during slot)
usageRules: Seat activates for booked window only; do not share licence; close application at end; misuse or sharing results in seat blacklist and disciplinary action.

name: Ansys Licence Seat
description: CAE licence seat for structural/thermal simulations; queue-based allocation.
usageRules: Use only for academic projects; exporting files off-campus requires approval; end session promptly; violations may cause licence revocation for the semester.

name: IDE Debug Kit (USB Pods)
description: Set of hardware debuggers for embedded coursework; checked out per slot.
usageRules: Inspect kit at checkout; report damage immediately; return all adapters; late return incurs booking freeze; damage due to negligence attracts replacement charges.

name: Code Review Station
description: Screen-recording workstation for usability studies and code demos.
location: Media Nook, CS-112 (sign in/out with TA)
usageRules: Obtain consent for recordings; store files in project folder; clear personal data after session; policy violations may result in content deletion and access ban.

name: Digital Oscilloscope 200MHz
description: 4-channel scope for time/frequency-domain measurements; probes included.
usageRules: Use correct probe attenuation; avoid over-voltage; return with probe tips capped; misuse may cause equipment ban and damage charges.

name: Function/Signal Generator
description: Arbitrary waveform generator with sweep and modulation.
usageRules: Start with low amplitude; verify 50Ω load; return cables neatly coiled; damage due to misuse billed to the user/group.

name: Spectrum Analyzer
description: RF spectrum analysis with marker/peak search; SMA adapters included.
usageRules: Never exceed max input power; use DC blocks where needed; complete pre- and post-checklist; violations lead to RF lab access suspension.

name: Logic Analyzer Kit
description: Logic analyzer with clips and leads for bus tracing.
usageRules: Use ESD precautions; clip correctly to avoid shorts; count accessories on return; lost leads will be charged.

name: Vector Network Analyzer (VNA)
description: S-parameter measurements; calibration required before session.
usageRules: Perform SOLT calibration at session start; avoid bending RF cables; report drift immediately; non-compliance ends session and flags future bookings.

name: FPGA/SoC Board (Xilinx)
description: Development board with JTAG and power kit; accessories included.
usageRules: Check board condition at issue; no external PSUs; return in ESD bag; late return freezes kit access for a week.

name: Soldering Workbench Station
description: ESD-safe bench with iron, hot‑air, fume extractor; PPE required.
usageRules: Wear PPE; enable fume extraction; keep flammables away; clean tips after use; burns or damage due to negligence will be reported and billed.

name: PCB Prototype Press
description: Rapid prototyping lamination/press for PCB layers (training required).
usageRules: Training certificate required; follow temperature/pressure SOP; allow cooldown before return; misuse voids access and incurs repair charges.

name: FDM 3D Printer
description: PLA/ABS prints; provide STL; nozzle/material guidelines apply.
usageRules: Pre-slice and estimate time; use approved filaments; lab staff loads filament; clean bed after; failed print due to user error consumes quota and may incur material charges.

name: SLA 3D Printer
description: Resin prints with post‑cure; PPE and curing time required.
usageRules: Wear gloves; avoid skin contact; staff handles resin; cure prints fully; spills or improper handling incur cleanup fees and access suspension.

name: CNC Mini Mill
description: Small-format CNC for soft metals/plastics; training and supervisor required.
usageRules: Complete safety briefing; supply CAM files; clamp workpiece securely; no unattended runs; damage due to misuse billed at repair cost and access revoked.

name: Lathe Trainer
description: Educational lathe for turning operations; PPE mandatory.
usageRules: Wear eye protection; remove jewelry; keep guards on; supervisor must be present; unsafe behavior ends session and triggers disciplinary action.

name: Universal Testing Machine
description: Tensile/compression testing with extensometer; technician-operated.
usageRules: Technician operates machine; declare specimen specs; do not exceed rated loads; failure to comply ends test; damages billed to project grants where applicable.

name: Hardness Tester
description: Rockwell/Brinell hardness measurements; standard indenter sets.
usageRules: Select correct scale; place specimen flat; log results; return with indenter protected; misuse results in repair fees and booking block.

name: Wind Tunnel Rig
description: Educational subsonic wind tunnel; setup/teardown buffer required.
usageRules: Attend pre-run checklist; secure models; observe cooldown period; unauthorized modifications lead to immediate suspension and damage liability.

name: Heat Exchanger Test Rig
description: Shell-and-tube/plate exchanger experiments; cooldown buffer enforced.
usageRules: Run per SOP; monitor temperatures/pressures; allow cooldown; spills or unsafe operation triggers shutdown and booking penalties.

name: Laser Cutter
description: Laser cutting for wood/acrylic/card; approved materials only.
usageRules: Complete safety briefing; use approved materials; keep lid closed while cutting; clean bed and filter tray; violations result in immediate ban and repair fees.

name: Desktop CNC Router
description: Small-format routing/milling for panels; bit library available.
usageRules: Fix stock securely; use correct bits and feeds; supervise at all times; damage due to misuse billed to user; repeated incidents trigger semester ban.

name: Large-format Plotter
description: A0/A1 plotting; queue-managed booking; paper at cost.
usageRules: Load paper as instructed; verify preview; remove scraps; damages or jam due to negligence charged to user; repeated waste leads to access restriction.

name: Photo Printer
description: High-quality photo prints up to A3+; color‑calibrated.
usageRules: Use approved media; run nozzle checks; handle prints with care; wasted ink/paper due to misuse billed to user; persistent misuse leads to ban.

name: Model-making Bench
description: Cutting mats, vices, hand tools; PPE and cleanup required.
usageRules: Wear PPE; keep blades capped; clean station after use; unsafe practices or unclean return results in booking suspension for a week.

name: Foam Cutter
description: Hot‑wire foam cutter; material guidelines apply.
usageRules: Use only approved foams; keep area ventilated; avoid contact with wire; misuse causes immediate stop and access ban; burns risk is user’s responsibility if SOP ignored.

name: VR Station
description: VR setup for design walkthroughs; supervised slots.
usageRules: Sanitize headset; use wrist straps; report nausea or discomfort; damages due to negligence billed; repeated incidents revoke access.

name: Portable Lighting Kit
description: LED panels with stands and diffusers for critiques.
usageRules: Do not tilt stands beyond limits; coil cables neatly; return diffuser cloths clean; loss or damage incurs replacement fee and booking freeze.
